member.name: M:LogInApi.Controllers.CollaboratorController.Post(LogInApi.Dtos.CreateCollaboratorDto)
member.summary: This method creates a new Collaborator and returns the created Collaborator
member.remarks: All fields can be edited. Cpf is required, must be valid and follow the format 000.000.000-00. Sex field is a single uppercase letter.
member.response: Returns the Collaborator with OK status
Returns an ERROR status due to validation error

member.name: M:LogInApi.Controllers.CollaboratorController.Put(System.String,LogInApi.Dtos.UpdateCollaboratorDto)
member.remarks: This method uses Cpf to search for the Collaborator. This method only searchs for active Collaborators. Only FullName, Phone, Sex and AddressId can be updated.
member.response: Returns an OK status with no content
Returns an ERROR status due to validation error
Returns an ERROR status due to collaborator not found
